siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
A haunting new pack is crossing over to our realm: The Sims™ 4 Paranormal Stuff Pack* is available on January 26! Get the first details here: http://x.ea.com/67260.

Spectral guests cause mischief and mayhem on Haunted House Lots, leaving behind accursed objects and scaring innocent Sims. With spooky activity on the rise, it’s up to you to put a stop to it. Luckily, Guidry the Ghost is happy to offer advice for sending these ghastly roommates packing. Perform séances, clean up the lot, and commune with the dead to clear them out. Once the lot is back to serenity, consider a career as a Paranormal Investigator to help other Sims!

Learn more about this Stuff Pack: http://x.ea.com/67256.  

*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES. FOR PC, SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THE PACK.
blogPost.body:
A haunting new pack is crossing over to our realm: The Sims™ 4 Paranormal Stuff Pack* is available on January 26! Get the first details here: http://x.ea.com/67260.

Spectral guests cause mischief and mayhem on Haunted House Lots, leaving behind accursed objects and scaring innocent Sims. With spooky activity on the rise, it’s up to you to put a stop to it. Luckily, Guidry the Ghost is happy to offer advice for sending these ghastly roommates packing. Perform séances, clean up the lot, and commune with the dead to clear them out. Once the lot is back to serenity, consider a career as a Paranormal Investigator to help other Sims!

Learn more about this Stuff Pack: http://x.ea.com/67256.  

*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES. FOR PC, SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THE PACK.
blogPost.title: The Sims 4 Paranormal Stuff Pack: Official Reveal Trailer
blogPost.author: The Sims

localize.title: 模拟人生4超自然事物包。官方揭秘预告片
localize.description:
Ein gespenstisches neues Pack hält Einzug in unser Reich: Das Die Sims™ 4 Paranormal Stuff Pack* ist ab dem 26. Januar erhältlich! Erfahre hier die ersten Details: http://x.ea.com/67260.

Gespenstische Gäste richten auf Spukhaus-Grundstücken Unheil und Chaos an, hinterlassen verfluchte Gegenstände und erschrecken unschuldige Sims. Da die gespenstischen Aktivitäten zunehmen, liegt es an dir, ihnen Einhalt zu gebieten. Zum Glück gibt dir Guidry, der Geist, Tipps, wie du die gruseligen Mitbewohner in die Flucht schlagen kannst. Führen Sie Séancen durch, räumen Sie das Grundstück auf und sprechen Sie mit den Toten, um sie zu vertreiben. Sobald auf dem Grundstück wieder Ruhe eingekehrt ist, kannst du eine Karriere als paranormaler Ermittler in Betracht ziehen, um anderen Sims zu helfen!

Erfahre mehr über dieses Stuff Pack: http://x.ea.com/67256.  

*ERFORDERT DIE SIMS 4 (SEPARAT ERHÄLTLICH) UND ALLE SPIEL-UPDATES. FÜR PC, SIEHE MINIMALE SYSTEMANFORDERUNGEN FÜR DAS PACK.

if this doesn't get 200k likes I'm switching genres... 
i already got a SCREAMO and K-POP song ready to go... like, comment, and SHARE :)

SoundCloud only: 


follow @ thatsdax on EVERYTHING
Shot by: Logan Meis

#Rapgod #Eminem #Dax 

btw if u made it this deep in the description you are a real one. there is too many lyrics to fit in here so i couldnt post them. They should be in my pinned post in the comment section! Let's go crazy!!! WE ARE THE LABEL

localize.title: DAX-Eminem《说唱上帝》Remix[One Take Video]
localize.description:
如果这不能赚到20万我要换类型的.
我已经准备好了一首尖叫和韩国流行歌曲.点赞、评论和分享：)

仅限SoundCloud：


在所有事情上都遵循@thatsdax
拍摄人：洛根·梅(Logan Meis)

#RapGOD #Eminem #DAX 

顺便说一句，如果你在描述中写得这么深，你就是一个真正的人。这里的歌词太多了，我无法上传。他们应该在我的评论区的固定帖子里！让我们疯狂起来吧！我们就是标签

localize.title: DAX-Eminem《說唱上帝》Remix[One Take Video]
localize.description:
如果這不能賺到20萬我要換類型的.
我已經準備好了一首尖叫和韓國流行歌曲.點贊、評論和分享：)

僅限SoundCloud：


在所有事情上都遵循@thatsdax
拍攝人：洛根·梅(Logan Meis)

#RapGOD #Eminem #DAX 

順便說一句，如果你在描述中寫得這麼深，你就是一個真正的人。這裏的歌詞太多了，我無法上傳。他們應該在我的評論區的固定帖子裏！讓我們瘋狂起來吧！我們就是標籤

next.excerpt:
Bowser has become gargantuan and lost all control! Join forces with Bowser Jr. to stop his big bad dad in the Bowser's Fury adventure, included in the Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury game. Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury launches on February 12, 2021 only on Nintendo Switch.

Learn more: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/super-mario-3d-world-plus-bowsers-fury-switch/

localize.title: 更大的坏蛋鲍瑟-超级马里奥3D世界+鲍瑟的愤怒-任天堂Switch
localize.description:
Bowser已经变成了巨无霸，失去了所有的控制权! 在《超级马里奥3D世界》+《Bowser's Fury》游戏中包含的Bowser's Fury冒险中，与小Bowser联手阻止他的大坏蛋老爸。超级马里奥3D世界+鲍瑟之怒》于2021年2月12日仅在任天堂Switch上推出。

了解更多信息：https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/super-mario-3d-world-plus-bowsers-fury-switch/

订阅更多任天堂的乐趣！https://goo.gl/HYYsot



请访问任天堂网了解所有最新情况！http://www.nintendo.com/。

localize.title: 更大的壞蛋鮑瑟-超級馬里奧3D世界+鮑瑟的憤怒-任天堂Switch
localize.description:
Bowser已經變成了巨無霸，失去了所有的控制權! 在《超級馬里奧3D世界》+《Bowser's Fury》遊戲中包含的Bowser's Fury冒險中，與小Bowser聯手阻止他的大壞蛋老爸。超級馬里奧3D世界+鮑瑟之怒》於2021年2月12日僅在任天堂Switch上推出。
